product_name: Club Ride Half Rack Bike Knickers - Men's
long_description: These rugged Club Ride Half Rack bike knickers offer more protection than shorts and more ventilation than full pants-the best of both worlds! RideDryWear(TM) nylon/spandex blend offers excellent moisture wicking, abrasion resistance and comfortable stretch. Adjustable waistband lets you personalize the fit. Articulated knees encourage full range of motion. Club Ride Half Rack bike knickers feature abundant storage pockets, including several secure zippered pockets.
short_description: These rugged Club Ride Half Rack bike knickers offer more protection than shorts and more ventilation than full pants-the best of both worlds!
